import React from 'react' import CartItem from '../CartItem/CartItem' import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import './CartDropdown.scss' const CartDropdown = ({cartItems, history}) => { history.pathname.location !== '/checkout' || history.pathname.location !== '/receipt' ? ( <>
{ cartItems ? ( cartItems.map(cartItem =>() )) : (No cart items) }
): null } export default withRouter(CartDropdown)
